question: Which among the following defines Hyperinflation?
option1: Cumulative inflation rate over three years approaching 100% to “inflation exceeding 50% a month
option2: Cumulative inflation rate over five years approaching 100% to “inflation exceeding 50% a month
option3: Growth in Inflation Level of 100 % in 3 years
option4: Growth in Inflation Level of 100 % in 1 year
answer: Cumulative inflation rate over three years approaching 100% to “inflation exceeding 50% a month
